channel.title: How do i change the sprites in clients?
channel.description: Does anyone know how to change the sprites in clients? Which java files do i edit? O and how do i make is so when i right click on something it tells me the idem id or object is and location?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 08:10:25 AM[/size][hr]Anybody? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 12:06:35 PM[/size][hr]Nobody knows? Someone has to... :| :([br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2007, 07:22:35 AM[/size][hr]Nobody cares?

item.title: How do i change the sprites in clients?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

ChaosCrud:

Just go to sprites inside your client, go to the one you wish to edit, right click and select EDIT, open up paint or whatever you have paste what pic you want to be added instead of the old sprite, copy it on paint then go back to the sprite which you clicked edit, click edit again and click paste, click save as click yes, their you go.

And where do i edit this? Which java files? And what do i put in them?

[quote="-Legend-, post:5, topic:117647"][quote author=viruz 3 link=topic=163108.msg1552867#msg1552867 date=1183060311]
The posts are at least 3 days apart from each other… This is allowed
[/quote]

Who said so?[/quote]
The Rules

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the sprites in clients?

item.title: How do i change the sprites in clients?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosCrud ChaosCrud
item.description:
@ChaosCrud wrote:

Just go to sprites inside your client, go to the one you wish to edit, right click and select EDIT, open up paint or whatever you have paste what pic you want to be added instead of the old sprite, copy it on paint then go back to the sprite which you clicked edit, click edit again and click paste, click save as click yes, their you go.

item.description:
@pa1ntb3ller wrote:

dont triple post ffs. go to sprites and find a pick same size on google, delete the one you want to replace copy the name past the new pic and name it the old one.
